page.title: 09BARN CONVERSIONS.
page.content: The most fashionable trend at the moment seems to be to convert old barns into houses. Recently one of the end barns at Middle Redcar Farm was converted into a large house which includes two guest rooms with adjoining bathrooms,a large lounge with a fireplace,a snooker room and a patio.It took about eight months to complete.This has now been named Redcar Wood Farm and joins the existing two cottages at Middle Redcar The barn at the opposite end of the row is now up for sale for a conversion along with 1\ acres of land.Also White Field Farm has put in for planning permission to convert the adjoining barn and dairy into another house. Prior to conversion the barn would cost about Â£30,000 and after,sell for at least twice as much.
